title: Crystal Vong
description: I am incredibly fortunate to have been a part of CAMS for the past two years and have watched it grown immensely, as a young society, since then. We are so fortunate to have a truly dynamic and enthusiastic team with us, ready to take on 2020, with many exciting ideas for events and opportunities for sponsors to get involved with.

title: Rahil
description: I have been involved in CAMS since 2019 and in the 3 years since, it has grown rapidly beyond our expectations. With our enthusiastic, dynamic and diverse committee and broad spectrum of events, there are many opportunities for sponsors to be involved with. Through our events, we love providing our members with a platform to enjoy medical school while also receiving the support they need. The future is exciting!
